description: Identification checks on new arrivals could help to tackle a rise in drug crime, a minister says.
title: Border identification checks 'could cut' Isle of Man drug crime
title_page: Border identification checks 'could cut' Isle of Man drug crime - BBC News
maintext: Mr Cregeen said plans to create a regulatory framework to allow for the cultivation and manufacture of medicinal cannabis on the island were being worked on by the Departments of Enterprise and Health, along with the Cabinet Office.
